page.title: 17Home Life in Cronton
page.content: {Home Life}Of the families in Cronton who were questioned all could be described as having a comfortable home life. {Food}69 households were questioned,57 ate their main meal in the evening. In 30 households the meal was totally prepared by the wife,the remainder shared the preparation.Of all the food consumed an average of 60% was convenience food (frozen.tinned,etc.) the remainder was fresh.A surprizing 35 of the households still baked part of the bread used. {Pets}Most households owned a pet, ranging from goldfish and rabbits to dogs and cats. Security,Safety All houses have locks on external doors, many on internal also. A few have burglar alarms.Most homes safety conscious as there are now so many hazards,gas,electric etc.
